dialogue.text: Dominic bobs in his bowl. He seems... wary of you.
Dominic narrows his fishy eyes. 'We’ve done this dance before. It ends badly for me.'

inventoryItem.name: Dominic (Deceased)
inventoryItem.description: A sadly lifeless fish in a bowl. Smells of regret.

take.response: Dominic lets out a tiny sigh as you pick him up. Moments later, he's gone. Again.
